description: Abandon an already sinking ship

description: For the first time in a long while, there's contentment

description: They are happy and no one can fault them for it...

description: Find comfort in the last person you expect to recieve it from

description: After everything they've gone through, this is a respite they both deserve. Together.

description: Theirs isn't a story that soars, but one sung in hushed whispers and quiet proclamations
